What We Play

Pixar style website, vibrant

imageAssets.description: Pixar-style logo for 'Douglas Crossing Band'. Text 'Douglas Crossing Band' or 'DXB' creatively integrated. Vibrant colors (e.g., blues, yellows, oranges), 3D-cartoon effect, friendly and energetic. Maybe incorporate subtle musical elements like a stylized guitar silhouette or musical notes within the design. Clean, legible, and iconic.
imageAssets.purpose: Main website logo for navbar and branding. Should be relatively wide.

imageAssets.description: Vibrant Pixar-style hero background image for a band website. A wide, joyful scene of an outdoor music festival or a brightly lit, colorful stage during a performance. Focus on a lively, family-friendly atmosphere with dynamic lighting and a sense of depth. Silhouettes or stylized, indistinct crowd figures are okay. No specific band members visible, more about the energy of a live show. Bright sky, perhaps some whimsical elements like floating musical notes or stylized trees/structures.
imageAssets.purpose: Hero section background image. Needs to be visually stunning and set the Pixar tone.

imageAssets.description: Pixar-style illustration of a 4-5 piece rock band (e.g., lead singer, guitarist, bassist, drummer, keyboardist - typical Douglas Crossing Band setup). Characters should be distinct, friendly, and expressive, in a dynamic mid-performance pose. Instruments clearly visible. Vibrant colors, fun cartoon style. Full body or 3/4 view. They should look like they are having a great time playing music.
imageAssets.purpose: Main image for 'The Band' / 'About Us' section. To visually represent the band in the Pixar theme.

imageAssets.description: A whimsical, Pixar-style illustration representing 'Events' or 'Calendar'. Could be a stylized, friendly-looking calendar page with a few dates circled, adorned with musical notes, stars, or small cartoon instruments. Alternatively, a stack of colorful, cartoonish concert tickets. Light, cheerful, and inviting.
imageAssets.purpose: Decorative image for the 'Events' or 'See Us Live' section.

imageAssets.description: Set of 3-4 small, Pixar-style decorative icons: 1. A single, cheerful musical note (eighth note or quaver). 2. A stylized, cute electric guitar. 3. A simple, friendly drum symbol (e.g., snare drum with sticks). All icons should be clean, simple, vibrant, and fit the overall Pixar aesthetic. Consistent style across icons.
imageAssets.purpose: Small decorative icons to be used sparingly throughout the website to enhance visual appeal and reinforce the music theme. Each icon as a separate image.
